title: ‘The Studio’ Season 2 Starts Filming Next Week, Seth Rogen Confirms
summary: Fresh off its Golden Globe win for best comedy or musical TV series, Apple TV’s “The Studio” is heading back behind the cameras next week. That’s the word from series star and executive producer Seth Rogen, who told press backstage at Sunday’s kudocast. Episode 8 of the Lionsgate-produced series’ S…
